description: Ground truth labels for metastasis interception validation - 38 genes mapped to 8-step cascade (aligned to real_target_lock_data.csv)
notes: v1.0.1 aligns the ground-truth gene universe to the 38-gene validation dataset used in the publication bundle (8×38=304 rows).
Removed 10 secondary genes that were present in v1.0.0 config but absent from the 38-gene score table: CDH1, FGF2, ITGA4, ITGB1, MAP2K2, PDGFRB, RAF1, SNAI2, VEGFR1, ZEB2.

local_invasion.description: EMT and invasion into surrounding tissue

survival_in_circulation.description: Resistance to anoikis and immune clearance

extravasation.description: Exit from circulation into distant tissue

angiogenesis.description: New blood vessel formation at metastatic site

AXL.rationale: AXL drives metastatic colonization and angiogenesis; active Phase 2 trial

TGFBR1.trial_title: TGFβR1 Inhibitor Phase 1/2 in Solid Tumors
TGFBR1.rationale: TGFβR1 promotes EMT and invasion; active Phase 1/2 trial

CLDN4.trial_title: Anti-CLDN4 CAR-T Phase 1 in Ovarian Cancer
CLDN4.rationale: CLDN4 mediates extravasation; active CAR-T Phase 1 trial

SRC.rationale: SRC promotes anoikis resistance; completed Phase 3 trial (dasatinib)

PTK2.rationale: FAK (PTK2) drives adhesion and colonization; active Phase 2 trial
PTK2.note: PTK2 is official gene symbol for FAK protein

NOTCH1.trial_title: Notch Inhibitor Phase 1 in Solid Tumors
NOTCH1.rationale: NOTCH1 regulates dormancy and angiogenesis; active Phase 1 trial

S100A4.trial_title: Anti-S100A4 Antibody Phase 1/2 in Metastatic Cancer
S100A4.rationale: S100A4 promotes EMT and invasion; active Phase 1/2 trial

PLOD2.trial_title: PLOD Inhibitor Phase 1 in Solid Tumors
PLOD2.rationale: PLOD2 remodels collagen for micrometastasis; active Phase 1 trial

CCL2.trial_title: CCL2 Inhibitor Phase 2 in Pancreatic Cancer
CCL2.rationale: CCL2 recruits macrophages for colonization; active Phase 2 trial

ANGPT2.trial_title: ANGPT2 Inhibitor Phase 3 in Ovarian Cancer
ANGPT2.rationale: ANGPT2 drives angiogenesis; active Phase 3 trial

validation_notes.per_step_data_points: 8 steps × 38 genes = 304 data points for validation

design_parameters.note: ±150bp flanks (300bp total context) for Evo2 scoring

assassin_weights.note: Structure lift added in v1.0.0 for AlphaFold3 validation
